text: Dolphin Tale is a 2011 American 3D family drama movie directed by Charles Martin Smith. It stars Harry Connick Jr., Ashley Judd, Nathan Gamble, Kris Kristofferson, Cozi Zuehlsdorff and Morgan Freeman. The book and movie are inspired by the true story of Winter, a bottlenose dolphin who lost her tail in 2005 and uses a prosthetic one. The movie was released on September 23, 2011, by Warner Bros. Pictures to positive reviews. A sequel, Dolphin Tale 2, was released on September 12, 2014. ==References== Category:2011 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American family movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies about whales Category:Movies set in Florida Category:Movies set underwater Category:Movies composed by Mark Isham
title: Dolphin Tale
